author: Special Correspondent
text:
Special UAN camps

The Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation will organise special camps in Madurai, Sivaganga, Virudhunagar, Dindigul and Ramanathapuram districts from January 11 to 29 to create awareness of Universal Account Number (UAN) among unregistered employees of factories and establishments.

According to a press release from Rabindra Samal, Regional Provident Fund Commissioner, the camp will be held in Madurai on January 11 and 18; in Sivakasi on January 12; in Dindigul on January 19; Rajapalayam on January 20; Sattur on January 21; Karaikudi on January 22; Valinokkam on January 27; Vedasandur on January 28 and in Palani on January 29.
title: Awareness programme
